tradeModePopup.title: Position Mode
tradeModePopup.titleHint: Adjustment to the position mode is only effective for the current trading order.
tradeModePopup.subTitle: What are the cross margin mode and isolated margin mode?
tradeModePopup.contentDescription1: Under cross margin mode, all the available balance in your account can be used as collateral to meet the maintenance margin required to avoid forced liquidation. If positions are liquidated, all the corresponding available balances may be lost.
tradeModePopup.contentDescription2: Under isolated margin mode, a certain amount of margin is allocated to the position, and the margin can be adjusted manually. Open positions will be liquidated if the position margin is below the maintenance margin level. In the case of forced liquidation, you may lose the initial margin and the additional margin added to this position.

bankAccountDetail.auditStatusTip: The review takes 1 working days. If you have any questions, please contact our customer support.
bankAccountDetail.successStatusTip: If you want to correct or delete your withdrawal account, please contact customer support.

transactionGuide.stepAccountType:
點擊真實帳戶，切換至模擬帳戶
可以通過模擬帳戶體驗交易下單，建立交易策略,並享受無風險的交易學習環境。
transactionGuide.stepAssetsReset1: 切換成模擬帳戶後，就可以到行情頁面開始進行交易了！
transactionGuide.stepAssetsReset2: 當資金淨值低於5萬美元,並無持倉無掛單的狀況下,可將資金淨值重置回10萬美元。
transactionGuide.stepHomeFutures: 點擊首頁的自選商品或點擊交易頁面，進入商品列表
transactionGuide.stepMarketFavorites:
可以自由添加喜歡的商品，並做排序
把喜歡的商品加進自選吧！
transactionGuide.stepFavoritesEdit1: 點擊並長壓可拖移排序
transactionGuide.stepMarketSelectProduct: 點擊列表中想要交易的商品，可以查看商品詳細的數據以及走勢圖
transactionGuide.stepProductDetailIntroduction1:
商品列表快捷功能
可以搜尋以及切換商品
transactionGuide.stepToTransaction: 請選擇 買入 進入下一步
transactionGuide.stepTransactionDirection2: 請選擇 買入 進入下一步
transactionGuide.stepTransactionDirection1: 可以自由切換要買入還是賣出
transactionGuide.stepLotsAdd1: 輸入交易數量，或點選旁邊的「＋」「−」符號調整數量
transactionGuide.stepLeverIntroduction1: 選擇槓桿，會跳出彈窗可以選擇想要的槓桿倍數
transactionGuide.stepLeverIntroduction2: 請選擇 槓桿 進入下一步
transactionGuide.stepProfitLossIntroduction1: 點擊「止盈」「止損」開關按鈕會展開，可以輸入此商品想止盈或止損的價格
transactionGuide.stepConfirmTransaction1: 確認設定後，按下買入或賣出，就成功交易了一筆訂單囉！
transactionGuide.stepViewPosition: 開倉成功後，就可以到倉位頁面查看持倉內容，這樣就完成了交易並且成功開倉！是不是很簡單，趕快來試試吧！

The currency used to calculate the profit of this trading product with the base currency.
Describe how much price can be by one unit of base currency.

rolloverDescSheet.descContent:
When you hold an open position past the overnight funding time, your account may be charged or credited with the corresponding overnight interest.
Settlement occurs at {timeZone} {time}; please note that the time zone may vary based on customer settings.

futuresContract.limitOrderDistanceDesc: Minimum distance between the price of the pending order and current price of the product
futuresContract.limitOrderValidityPeriod: Time in force for pending orders
futuresContract.limitOrderValidityPeriodDesc: Time frame in which unexecuted orders will remain active.
futuresContract.weekdayMarginCloseoutRate: Ratio for forced liquidation on weekdays
futuresContract.weekdayMarginCloseoutRateDesc: On weekdays, any account with a risk ratio below the specified ratio will trigger forced liquidation unless the risk ratio increases to the level higher than the specified ratio.
futuresContract.holidayMarginCloseoutRate: Rate of forced liquidation on weekends
futuresContract.holidayMarginCloseoutRateDesc: During weekend settlements, any account with a risk ratio below the specified ratio will trigger forced liquidation unless the risk ratio increases to the level higher than the specified ratio.
futuresContract.contractEndTimeDesc: Last trading session for this product.
futuresContract.tip: Our company reserves the right to modify the above data at any time due to market changes.
futuresContract.holidayDesc: If there is a conflict with the trading hours, the holiday closing time will take priority.
futuresContract.handlingFeeDesc: Charge ${value} per lot for opening a trade.

futuresAlert.alertWhenPrice: when the following prices are reached.

futuresDetail.marketClose: The market is closed－only orders are accepted.
futuresDetail.fullWarehouseTipContent:
This is a cross leverage transaction, and the loss amount can exceed the margin amount. 

When continuous losses cause the account to reach the liquidation line, other orders will be liquidated one after another, and all the account funds will be lost! 

It is recommended that you set take profit and stop loss prices to control the funds more efficiently!
futuresDetail.marketCloseNoTrading: Trading is not available during the time period when the market is closed.

noWithdrawCategory.content:

1. Funds cannot be withdrawn through the withdrawal channel again due to the daily withdrawal amount reaching the upper limit. 
2. System is under maintenance.

paymentBank.confirmPaymentButton: Deposit now to enjoy the trading.
paymentBank.remindTip:
Please transfer funds through your own account. 
The account is valid for 24 hours. 
The transfer amount must be consistent. 
Please do not make duplicate transfers.
paymentBank.toTransferButton: Get transfer information to transfer funds.
paymentBank.learnInfoReady: I already understand the above information.
paymentBank.transferDescriptionTip:
注意事項：
1.請依照入金提單金額轉帳,轉帳金額與申請金額不一致,則無法轉帳成功。
2.請勿重覆匯款。
3.超過有效期限,則無法轉帳成功。

   3. Abnormal deposit and withdrawal behavior

depositUsdt.bottomTip:
注意事項：
1.請務必使用TRC20主網網絡進行數字資產轉帳，如果您選擇其他主網網絡，數字資產將無法到帳。

2.轉帳金額與申請金額不一致,則無法轉帳成功。
超過有效期限,則無法轉帳成功。請不要重複匯款。

logCollectionPopup.title: Log Report
logCollectionPopup.tip: We value your privacy. The log data you provide will only be used for troubleshooting our issues and improving application performance. We promise not to use this data for any other purpose and will take appropriate security measures to protect your information. Your trust is essential to us, and we are committed to ensuring the security of your data.
logCollectionPopup.dateTip: Collect logs for the selected time with a range of 5 minutes before and after, earliest up to 30 minutes ago.
logCollectionPopup.copyTip: Copy the reference number and inform our customer service representative so that we can better assist you.
logCollectionPopup.logReportDescContent: Log reporting is a process of collecting and recording data to track and document the activities and events of an application, system, or service. These records typically include information about operations, errors, warnings, exceptions, and other significant events.
